metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3973 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
vim is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3973` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-athena - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-gtk - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-gui-common - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-nox - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-runtime - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
vim-tiny - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
xxd - 2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.1.2269-1ubuntu5.6').
